channel.title: ChatBack History not loading properly
channel.description:
Well, since I made my client full screen, the chat back history isn't set up properly and I'm having some trouble positioning it correctly. Here's a pic:
[img]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/1523/transkp.png[/img]
It's circled in red and that's the chat history. Does anybody know how to position it so that it goes into the chat back and isn't so small in the corner? Along with the mapScenes, I think that's what they are called. The little mini map icons, such as the bank icon, water fountain icon and such on the mini map. I'm having trouble positioning that as well. I'd greatly appreciate it.
Thanks.

item.title: ChatBack History not loading properly
item.dc:creator: @Continue Continue
item.description:
@Continue wrote:

Well, since I made my client full screen, the chat back history isn’t set up properly and I’m having some trouble positioning it correctly. Here’s a pic:

It’s circled in red and that’s the chat history. Does anybody know how to position it so that it goes into the chat back and isn’t so small in the corner? Along with the mapScenes, I think that’s what they are called. The little mini map icons, such as the bank icon, water fountain icon and such on the mini map. I’m having trouble positioning that as well. I’d greatly appreciate it.
